extension.description: LiveLite is an addon capable of loading custom m3u playlists with live tv channels and playing them. Can utilize youtube-dl or urlresolver for streams that need resolving.
Το πρόσθετο LiveLite έχει την δυνατότητα αναπαραγωγής ζωντανών καναλιών μέσω λιστών αναπαραγωγής, της μορφής m3u. Χρησιμοποιεί τα πρόσθετα youtube-dl ή urlresolver όπου χρειαστεί.
extension.news:
+ 2.0.1 (2016-11-21) - Bug Fixes
+ 2.0.0 (17-11-2016) - Addon id was change to lowercase - Added several localized strings - Removed default playlist (android greek tv). Setting is now completely blank. - Implemented group switcher (can choose up to 75 different groups) - Some new and some changed icons - More improvements to regex patterns > It can now handle some incorrectly placed parameters > Improvement was also done to accommodate the group function > Accepts non-ascii (unicode) characters in title - Group switcher is not visible when only one group is used.
